text.tspan: Figure 3. Percentage of truck drivers who retain their occupation in period 2,
text.title: Figure 3. Percentage of truck drivers who retain their occupation in period 2, 2004–17

text.tspan: Click legend items to change data display. Hover over chart to view data.
Source: Authors' calculations based on data from the Current Population Survey Outgoing Rotation Groups, 2003–17.
